QuestData.Title: Grimtotem Chiefs: Elder Stormhoof
QuestData.Description: Elder Stormhoof is a shaman chief of immense power. He was taught by Magatha Grimtotem, the Elder Crone, leader of the Grimtotem clan.$B$BWe know that he is here and that he has been training their geomancers. We have to kill him, $c.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Beware his mastery of the elements!
QuestData.CompletionText: We must kill Elder Stormhoof before we deal with the rest of the Grimtotem chiefs.
QuestData.RewardText: That was not pleasant. I wonder what he meant by calling you, "the Chosen"?
